channel.title: Magic on Mordheim Regelwerk
channel.description: Recent content in Magic on Mordheim Regelwerk

item.title: Dark Elf Magic
item.description: Difficulty Name 9+ 1 - Doombolt The bolt of doom may be targeted at any enemy model in line of sight. The Doombolt has an 18" range and causes a Strength 4 hit. If the target model is wounded, then the next closest model within 3" is also hit on a 4+, at -1 Strength than the previous hit. The bolt will keep leaping until there are no more targets within range or until its Strength drops to a one.
